body:
R Fritz wrote:
A peek at Mark Stock's radiance benchmark page
(http://mark.technolope.org/pages/rad_bench.html) shows that someone is
using Solaris, but on AMD architecture.  Other than that, it's the usual
suspects...  I'd bet there are still some users running on OS X on G4, too.
replyTo: Subject: [Radiance-general] What platforms are people using for Radiance
subject: [Radiance-general] What platforms are people using for Radiance
